page.title: 15Brown Brothers Ltd.
page.content: {Brown brothers}is a company who make and distrubute expanded Polysterene all over the country. This factory is located on coach lane, on a disused mine works. The industry was established in 1976 after the{coal {mine}had closed down. The site covers approx 5 acres, part of this land is waste. The factory is made of common building materials. The{factory}is clean in appearence and quite modern, there is a car park for the employees, also there is a bus service which stops right outside the factory. The surrounding area is farmland, the kind of thing you would see out in the country.
